name: my-favourite-league
description: An application to keep track of your favorite or strongest champions in the MOBA League of Legends

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.setup-heroku: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run clean && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cp -R ./frontend/build ./backend/build
scripts.start: npm run setup-heroku && npm run prepare-deploy && npm run start-live

author: Fabian Kresler
